scripts.build:angular: cd examples/angular/pokemon-catalog && npx yarn install --frozen-lockfile && npm run build
scripts.build:react: cd examples/react/pokemon-catalog &&npx yarn install --frozen-lockfile && npm run build
scripts.build:lit: cd examples/lit/pokemon-catalog && npx yarn install --frozen-lockfile && npm run build
scripts.build:examples: concurrently 'npm run build:react' 'npm run build:angular' 'npm run build:lit'
scripts.test:examples: npm run test:react && npm run test:angular && npm run test:lit
scripts.validate:examples: npm run validate:react && npm run validate:angular  && npm run validate:lit
scripts.e2e:examples: npm run e2e:react && npm run e2e:angular && npm run e2e:lit
scripts.merge-reports:angular: cd examples/angular/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > cypress/results/json/merged.json
scripts.merge-reports:react: cd examples/react/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > cypress/results/json/merged.json
scripts.merge-reports:lit: cd examples/lit/pokemon-catalog && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/json/*.json > cypress/results/json/merged.json
scripts.merge-reports:examples: concurrently 'npm run merge-reports:react'  'npm run merge-reports:angular'  'npm run merge-reports:lit'
scripts.copy-build:examples: mkdir -p build && npm run copy-build:react && npm run copy-build:angular && npm run copy-build:lit
scripts.predeploy:examples: npm run predeploy:react && npm run predeploy:angular && npm run predeploy:lit
scripts.predeploy: npm run predeploy:examples && npm run copy-build:examples
